Class RaytracerSetupButtons 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component
           |
           +----java.awt.Container
                   |
                   +----java.awt.Panel
                           |
                           +----SetupButtonPanel
                                   |
                                   +----RaytracerSetupButtons
public class RaytracerSetupButtons
extends SetupButtonPanel
RaytracerSetupButtons.java realestate on the destop for placing setup control buttons.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

RaytracerSetupButtons(Sim, SetupElementsPanel)

add_light(TLight)
add light from raytracer.
add_object(DisplayFrameElement, TColor, TColor, TColor, T3d)
add object from raytracer.
draw_scene()
draw objects in setup's wireframe using scene and viewing data stored in setup.
new_scene()
erase current data from setup.
save_scene()
pass current scene to raytracer and generate src code for the code window.
set_view(T3d, double)
add light from raytracer.

 public RaytracerSetupButtons(Sim s,
                              SetupElementsPanel ep)

draw objects in setup's wireframe using scene and viewing data stored in setup.

erase current data from setup.

                        TColor a,
                        TColor d,

                        T3d c)
add object from raytracer.

 public void add_light(TLight l)
add light from raytracer.

 public void set_view(T3d v,
                      double d)
add light from raytracer.

 public void save_scene()
pass current scene to raytracer and generate src code for the code window.
